definition[0]: someone who owns or works in a shop that sells meat
definition[1]: someone who has killed someone else cruelly and unnecessarily, especially someone who has killed a lot of people
definition[2]: to kill animals and prepare them to be used as meat
definition[3]: to kill someone cruelly or unnecessarily, especially to kill a lot of people
definition[4]: to spoil something by working carelessly
example[0]: That hairdresser really butchered my hair!
